english.segment1: Turn up the car radio. We can be karaoke superstars. Doesn't matter what they think. When we're driving in my car. If we don't think about it

english.segment3: I feel alone. I feel unseen. I feel marked down. I just get my keys
english.segment4: And we can. Turn up the car radio. We can be karaoke superstars. Doesn't matter what they think. When we're driving in my car. If we don't think about it
english.segment5: Red rover red rover I don't wanna come over. Cut me down to your size so you tower me over. It only works if I care and if I don't your reign's over. And it's alright maybe it's alright maybe it's
english.segment6: I am alone. I am unleashed. I define myself. I just get my keys
english.segment7: Turn up the car radio. We can be karaoke superstars. Doesn't matter what they think. When we're driving in my car. If we don't think about it
english.segment8: Red rover red rover if you want then come over. It's a no critic car so there's no one to win over. Be your own superstar when the voting is over. And we're alright baby we're alright
